tasks.task: Performing agricultural operations using farming equipment.
subtasks: Operating a seabed prep rig.
Applying fertilizer using a seabed finisher.
Guiding the John Deere 8370R vehicle along the field.
Attaching Demco saddle tanks to the John Deere 8370R.
Pulling a DB planter with the John Deere 8370R to plant corn.
Operating an air seeder attached to a 9RT vehicle.
Drilling barley into the soil with the air seeder.
Checking and adjusting the front wheel assist on the DB planter.
Ensuring proper operation of the front wheel assist without slippage.
Verifying the use of four-wheel drive for the front wheel assist.
Deciding to use a single row marker for a small planting machine.
Confirming the lack of folding wings on a small planter.
Planning to install a new seeder in the coming days.
Completing row markers for a DB60 24-row planter.
Addressing the current planter's issues (struggle bus) for better efficiency.
Anticipating the arrival of a crew (Adamnovie).
Considering a potential additional video recording opportunity.

tasks.task: Operating farm equipment for various agricultural activities.
subtasks: Preparing the seabed using a seabed prep rig.
Applying fertilizer across a field with a seabed finisher.
Driving a John Deere 8370R with attached Demco saddle tanks.
Pulling a DB planter to plant corn.
Using an air seeder on a 9RT vehicle to drill barley.
Adjusting the front wheel assist on the planter for better performance.
Securing four-wheel drive on the front wheel assist.
Planning to install a new seeder and finish row markers.

tasks.task: Coordinating crew and equipment for continuity.
subtasks: Anticipating a crew's arrival for ongoing work.
Considering additional filming opportunities with a crew member.
